ModMetaData.name: Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox [Deluxe Edition] 个人修改版
ModMetaData.author: いのしし_3
ModMetaData.description:
个人修改版，请勿与原版共同使用 基于HSK版进一步修改 添加武器弹药 添加装备装甲值 细碎修改 <color=yellow>~ (KTTFDE) ~</color>
✲ This mod is fan-made continuation of Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox.
<color=yellow>~ (Details) ~</color>
✲ Details are on the workshop page of this mod.
<color=yellow>~ (Credits) ~</color>
Thanks to creators and everyone else who has contributed to the creation of original Kurin, The Three Tailed Fox. Thanks to Ori (어리) a.k.a 어리연 for an artwork for storyteller's portrait. Thanks to DesTiNy and Zaxsdgpl for korean translation of KTTFDE.
